DOC.criteria: Men woman ( childbearing potential ) Chinese ethnicity Weigh least 50 kg body mass index ( BMI ) 19 24 kg/m2 Must normal physical examination , laboratory value , ECG , pulse blood pressure unless investigator considers abnormality clinically significant .
